title: [Epidemiology] Four persons with COVID-19 infection traveled on the same flight from to Hong Kong. Their virus genetic sequences are identical, unique, and belong to a clade not previously identified in Hong Kong, which strongly suggests that the coronavirus can be transmitted during air travel.

[Psychology] As Pandemic Progressed, People's Perceived Risks Went Up. The study also identified a subset of participants who continued to feel that they were at a low risk of harm from COVID-19 even as the pandemic unfolded, and consequently did not engage in any protective behaviors
